dict.acceptation: 准备；预备（饭菜）；配备；使（自己）有准备；
筹备，进行各项准备工作；做好思想准备；作出，制订；锻炼（身体等），训练；

sent.orig: Prepare monthly working capital review; prepare cash flow forecasts and liquidity management for Corporate Treasury.
sent.trans: 每月审查运营资本状况；提交总公司财政部现金流预测和现金流动性管理表。

sent.orig: All ships prepare for enemy fire!
Objective: To prepare the compound ornidazole tincture and study the quality control of this preparation.
sent.trans: 目的：研制复方奥硝唑酊剂并对制剂进行质量控制。

sent.orig: Coordinate, prepare and implementation HSEQ training.
sent.trans: 负责工厂培训的安排和实施。

sent.orig: These statistical data for epidemiological investigation and compensation to be taken to prepare the work.
sent.trans: 这些数据的统计是为流行病学调查和即将采取的赔偿工作进行准备。
